He filled the girls' albums with verses and music, and having at last sent D61okhov the whole forty-three thousand rubles and received his receipt, he left at the end of November, without taking leave of any of his acquaint- ances, to overtake his regiment which was al- ready in Poland. 
Book Five: 1806-
